## load packages
```{r}
setwd("~/Desktop/Rice_GWAS_project/data/gapit_data/")
library(GAPIT)
library(data.table)
```

## load in data
```{r}
geno <- read.delim("~/Desktop/Rice_GWAS_project/data/GENO_data/1_GBSCornell_IndicaPray_81347snps_271_accs.hmp.txt", header = FALSE)
pheno <- read.table("~/Desktop/Rice_GWAS_project/data/gapit_data/oxi_data.txt", head = TRUE)
marker <- read.table("~/Desktop/Rice_GWAS_project/data/gapit_data/marker_info.txt", head = TRUE)
```

```{r}
gapit_GWAS <- GAPIT(
  Y=pheno[,c(1,10,11,19)],
  G=geno,
  PCA.total=3,
  NJtree.group=3,
  model=c("GLM","MLM","SUPER","MLMM","FarmCPU","Blink"))
```
